Token.Abstract: This helper class implements the RKRequestSerializable protocol to provide support for creating the multi-part request body for RKRequest objects.
Creates and returns an RKParams object that is ready for population.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An RKParams object to be populated.

Token.Abstract: Creates and returns an RKParams object created from a dictionary of key/value pairs.

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary of key/value pairs to add as RKParamsAttachment objects.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An RKParams object with the key/value pairs of the dictionary.

Token.Abstract: Initalize an RKParams object from a dictionary of key/value pairs

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary of key/value pairs to add as RKParamsAttachment objects.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An RKParams object with the key/value pairs of the dictionary.

Token.Abstract: Creates a new RKParamsAttachment from the key/value pair passed in and adds it to the attachments array.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: Value of the attachment to add

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: Key name of the attachment to add

ReturnValue.Abstract: the new RKParamsAttachment that was added to the attachments array

Token.Abstract: Creates a new RKParamsAttachment for a named parameter with the data contained in the file at the given path and adds it to the attachments array.

Parameter.Name: filePath
Parameter.Abstract: String of the path to the file to be attached

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: Key name of the attachment to add

ReturnValue.Abstract: the new RKParamsAttachment that was added to the attachments array

Token.Abstract: Creates a new RKParamsAttachment for a named parameter with the data given and adds it to the attachments array.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: NSData object of the data to be attached

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: Key name of the attachment to add

ReturnValue.Abstract: the new RKParamsAttachment that was added to the attachments array

Token.Abstract: Creates a new RKParamsAttachment for a named parameter with the data given and the MIME type specified and adds it to the attachments array.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: NSData object of the data to be attached

Parameter.Name: MIMEType
Parameter.Abstract: String of the MIME type of the data

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: Key name of the attachment to add

ReturnValue.Abstract: the new RKParamsAttachment that was added to the attachments array

Token.Abstract: Creates a new RKParamsAttachment and sets the value for a named parameter to a data object with the specified MIME Type and attachment file name.

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: NSData object of the data to be attached

Parameter.Name: MIMEType
Parameter.Abstract: String of the MIME type of the data

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: String of the attachment file name

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: Key name of the attachment to add

ReturnValue.Abstract: the new RKParamsAttachment that was added to the attachments array

Token.Abstract: Creates a new RKParamsAttachment and sets the value for a named parameter to the data contained in a file at the given path with the specified MIME Type and attachment file name.

Parameter.Name: filePath
Parameter.Abstract: String of the path to the file to be attached

Parameter.Name: MIMEType
Parameter.Abstract: String of the MIME type of the data

Parameter.Name: fileName
Parameter.Abstract: String of the attachment file name

Parameter.Name: param
Parameter.Abstract: Key name of the attachment to add

ReturnValue.Abstract: the new RKParamsAttachment that was added to the attachments array

Token.Abstract: Get the dictionary of params which are plain text as specified by RFC 5849.

ReturnValue.Abstract: NSDictionary of key/values extracting from the RKParamsAttachment objects that meet the plain text criteria

Token.Abstract: Resets the state of the RKParams stream.
Return a composite MD5 checksum value for all attachments.
